scenes.background: Monica nervously fidgets with her pen while Bob leans against the desk, arms crossed.
scenes.description: 'You know, I really did try my best. Maybe we need to rethink our approach here?'

options.text: Maybe we should take a step back and re-evaluate our strategies.
options.analysis: You suggested a calm and reflective approach, showing good perception and self-regulation, though the emotional impact on others was not deeply addressed.

options.text: It’s clear things aren’t working. Monica, can you pinpoint where it went wrong?
options.analysis: You acknowledged the issue and sought specifics from Monica, showing empathy and social skills, but the perception of the broader problem could be stronger.

options.text: I think we need to discuss this later and come up with a better plan.
options.analysis: You suggested postponing the discussion to avoid immediate conflict, showing good social skill but lower empathy and motivation to resolve the issue now.
